name: CoronaKiller
description:
This is a simple calculation game. It is developed having "calculate" and "CoronaVirus outbreak" theme in mind for Brain JAM 

CoronaKiller is an imaginary vaccine of novel CoronaVirus. In this game, you have to mix (or sum) small pathogens to match some target pathogens in order to archive a strong CoronaKiller. There is a timer for each target pathogen, you have to match it before time ends.

Rules :  

  • Click and Drag to start selecting pathogens.
  • You can select from lowest 2 to highest 25 pathogens at a time to match a target pathogen.
  • You can only select adjacent (top,bottom,up,down and 4 corner) pathogens of a selected pathogen.
  • If sum of all selected pathogens equal a target pathogen, it will be matched and new target pathogen will arrive. 

Assets - All asset used here are free to use and publicly available. 
Fonts - https://www.fontspace.com/honey-and-death/spacy
             https://www.dafont.com/crushed-3.font

Music -      http://www.orangefreesounds.com/mysterious-synth-pad-cinematic/

Graphics - https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/set-lab-equipment_4344917.htm


To Enjoy full game visit - http://games.saz-zad.com/CoronaKiller/
